alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fayette, south central Fulton and northern Clayton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 250 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Riverdale, or near Fayetteville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Union City, Riverdale, College Park, Morrow and Hartsfield-Jackson Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
